mapper.select: select w.*,b.branchname from t_b_weixin w LEFT OUTER JOIN t_branch b on w.branchid=b.branchid where 1=1 and w.branchid=#{branchid} and b.branchname like CONCAT('%',#{branchname},'%') and w.partner=#{partner}

select b.branchname from t_branch b where 1=1
and b.branchid=#{branchid}

select b.branchid from t_branch b where 1=1
and b.branchname=#{branchname}

select t.id,t.code,t.name,t.type_name,d.discount from t_p_preferential_activity t LEFT OUTER JOIN t_p_preferential_detail d on t.id=d.preferential where t.type=#{activityCode} and now()>t.starttime and now()<date(t.endtime) ORDER BY t.starttime desc limit 1
select count(1) from t_b_weixin_temp where orderno=#{orderno}
select count(1) from t_b_weixin where branchid=#{branchid}
